__e: Excuse me, but I am not Kitty's mother, and she sure as hell is not our child.
You know,the very thing that you like least about kitty is the thing that I love the most about her.
We have to be realistic. But the thing is, I can't leave Kitty. What, with all the sexual intercourse and whatnot.
And while you're there, find out from your assistant, Kitty... why she didn't send my paycheck.
In six years of marriage Kitty has never thought about my work.
Kitty, I don't need you to agree with me.
Kitty missed out with you, you know?
Now, if Kitty is right about these recent deaths, and there's more to them than meets the eye, it's likely that he's hired someone to do the killing for him.
Did Kitty really say she wasn't worthy?
Kitty telephoned me last night and she asked me to meet her.
Speaking of which, Kitty, I'm sorry that you had to find me half-dead.
Kitty told me you were here, I just wanna make sure you're okay.
